name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - B  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a blue bear that holds a baseball?
questions.explanation:
Baby Boy.

	There are a total of three different Baby Boy Bears.  The first Baby Boy holds a baseball and wears a blue cap.  The second is a blue bear that holds a pillow and wears a night cap.  Neither of these have poems available on the official Ty website.  The final one is an older bear, to be a father.  He, too, is blue, but his chest says "It's a boy."  He comes with a poem... "Ten little fingers, ten little toesA tuft of hair, a button noseThis healthy, bouncing baby boyWill bring you love and lots of joy!"

questions.text: Which of these dogs has the name of something we usually collect on FunTrivia other than points?
questions.explanation:
Badges.

	Badges is a light brown dog with dark brown ears.  He is a very soft dog.  He also has a brown bow tied around his neck. "A puppy's job is just to playSo I will do my job todayI'll jump and run, and when I'm throughI'll come and snuggle up with you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a bald eagle?
questions.explanation:
Baldy.

	Baldo the eagle is a regular black eagle with a white head.  He has yellow feet and a yellow beak. "Hair on his head is quite scantWe suggest Baldy get a transplantWatching over the land of the freeHair in his eyes would make it hard to see!"

questions.text: Which of these is a colorful ape?
questions.explanation:
Bananas.

	Bananas is an orangutan, although he doesn't look like one.  He has many colors, including an orange face, a brown body, yellow hair, and a purple mouth and ears.  He also had yellowish white eyebrows and orange hands and feet. "If you'll come and play with meWe will swing from tree to treeThen we'll go and have some lunchWe'll eat bananas by the bunch!"

questions.text: What is the reason Bandito the raccoon says he wears a mask?
options: He's really a cat in disguise
He needs glasses but wears a mask instead
questions.explanation:
He's shy.

	Bandito is a raccoon with very soft fabric.  He sits like Aurora, or Sarge, and many others like this, and has a large bushy tail.  Like any raccoon, he wears a mask. "You might wonder enough to askJust why it is I wear a maskAn outlaw's life I can't denyBut I'm really just kinda shy!"

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies is a bird that is also a type of fruit?
questions.explanation:
Beak.

	Beak is a kiwi, which is also a soft, fuzzy, brown fruit with a green inside.  Kiwi can also describe someone from New Zealand.  Beak has a very long beak. "Isn't this just the funniest bird?When we saw her, we said "how absurd"Looks aren't everything, this we knowHer love for you, she's sure to show!"

questions.text: Who is the Bob Evans exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Biscuit.

	Biscuit is a yellowish colored dog with his tongue sticking out.  He wears a red velvet bow, and looks very similar to Pudding the Beanie Baby. "With my friend, Gravy, next to meWhen we're hungry we agreeGo to the place with country charmWhere cooking's like down on the farm!"

questions.text: There are actually two Beanie Babies named Bonzer, but which one holds leaves in his hands?
questions.explanation:
Koala.

	Bonzer the koala holds eucalyptus leaves in his hands.  Bonzer the dog has a collar, but he is a dog, so he cannot hold anything. "I think my name is really coolIt's a word you won't learn in schoolIt means, "awesome" and you'll agreeThat this name fits me perfectly!"

questions.text: Which three bears look exactly alike except for the different colored backpacks?
questions.explanation:
Books.

	Although there are several different Billionaire Bears, they don't wear backpacks.  Books comes in blue, red, and purple. "Reading and arithmeticFun when you get the hang of itStudy hard and go to classAnd I know you're sure to pass!"

questions.text: Which of these is an Australian exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Bounder.

	Bounder is a kangaroo with a joey in her pouch.  She also has an Australian flag on her lower left hip. "Bounder's our new kangaroo She'd love to come and play with you Full of fun and fancy free An Aussie gift to you from me!"
